section.heading: Adulterated candy not to be made or sold.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 8(a) of Food Regulation Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-147, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 10183).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 8(a) of Food Regulation Emergency Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-128, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7939).
For temporary (225 day) repeal of §§ 48-201 to 48-203, see § 8(a) of Food Regulation Temporary Amendment Act of 2001 (D.C. Law 14-55, December 6, 2001, law notification 49 DCR 356).
